Introduction¶

pflacs means faster load-cases and parameter studies.

  • Installation
  • Basic Usage
  • References

Installation¶

To install the pflacs module run:

pip install pflacs

Basic Usage¶

Basic usage of pflacs is demonstrated in the notebook below (also available at this link):
